content: times or to desired blanket length less 1 ½ as you work continue to make short row before row 13 14 27 and 28 of the stitch pattern on every repeat switch to edging needle knit 14 row bind off loosely finishing block lightly to measurements and weave in ends place gently over a sleeping baby page 6 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket make short row at the beginning of row 13 14 27 and 28 on each repeat page 7 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com
